description: System-generated unique identifier for this estimated part line associated with a work-order asset procedure.
Foreign key referencing the parent work-order/asset procedure this estimated part requirement belongs to.
Indicator that the estimated part requirement has been fully fulfilled or closed for the procedure; likely a boolean flag. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the inventory item to be used on the related work-order asset procedure.
Code of the warehouse or storeroom from which the part is planned to be sourced.
Planned quantity of the part expected to be needed for the procedure.
Flag indicating whether this part is mandatory (versus optional) to perform the work; likely a boolean. Confirm with SME.
Estimated per-unit cost of the part at planning time, used for budgeting and forecasting.
Quantity of the part still outstanding for this line (planned minus issued or used).
System timestamp when this estimated part line was last updated in the source application.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated update to this line; likely distinct from automated system updates. Confirm with SME.
User account that originally created this estimated part line.
Timestamp when this estimated part line was created.
User account that most recently modified this line.
Timestamp when this line was most recently modified.
